content.rendered:
Directed by Aanand L. Rai

Written by Himanshu Sharma

Star Dhanush (Vishu). Sara Ali Khan (Rinku). Akshay Kumar (Sajjad). Seema Biswas (Dulhayen – Rinku’s Naani). Ashish Verma (Madhusudhan). Dimple Hayathi (Mandakini aka Mandy). Pankaj Jha (Rinku’s Mama 1). Ashok Banthia (Rinku’s Mama 2). Vijay Kumar (Matadin). Anil Grover (Dablu). Bharti Gola (Rinku’s Mami). Anand Babu (Vishu’s Father). Nithiyaa Ravindhar (Vishu’s Mother). G. Marimuthu (Mandy’s Father). Jaya Swaminathan (Mandy’s Mother). Gopal Datt (Divorce Lawyer). Rana Pratap Sengar (Man in Train). Mannat Mishra (Baby Rinku). Rahul Khanna (Vishu’s Colleague 1). Gurjeet Pathak (Vishu’s Colleague 2). Amit Tiwari (Vishu’s Colleague 3). Alok Maurya (Vishu’s Colleague 4). Sahil Mukhi (Vishu’s Colleague 5). Deepak Adhikari (Vishu’s Colleague 6). Pradeep Kumar (Vishu’s Colleague 7). Shivam Bhasin (Vishu’s Colleague 8). Asha Jha (Vishu’s Colleague 9). Davinder Kaur (Vishu’s Colleague 10). Pranjal (Vishu’s Colleague 11). Shafali (Vishu’s Colleague 12). Rajesh Salvi (Vishu’s Colleague 13). Rohit Singh Rajput (Pandit in Haweli). Prabhakar Pandey (Canteen Waiter)

Language Hindi. Tamil

Producers Shiv Chanana. Nitin Dalvi. Kanupriya. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Roopali Narayan. Aanand L. Rai. Ravi Sarin. Himanshu Sharma. Sonam Budha Sharmaa. Shashikant Sinha. Vihang Suryavanshi. Ashish Tandel. Shantanu Tungare

Production Cape of Good Films. Colour Yellow Productions. T-Series Films
